short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily access AI sites via side panel

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI Side Panel Extension

Enhance Your Productivity with Seamless AI Integration!


The AI Side Panel Extension brings the power of popular AI tools directly to your browser. Easily access and interact with sites like Gemini and ChatGPT through a convenient side panel, designed to integrate smoothly into your browsing experience.

No more switching tabs or windows!

Just toggle the panel and start creating, translating, writing, or coding with ease. Boost your productivity today.

Key Features:

* Side Panel Access: Quickly reach your favorite AI sites without interrupting your workflow.
* Easy Toggle: Open or close the side panel with a single click on the extension icon or by using the ALT + Q shortcut.
* Streamlined Experience: Enjoy a distraction-free way to leverage AI tools while you browse.

Perfect for anyone looking to boost productivity and integrate advanced AI resources into their daily tasks.

Install the AI Side Panel Extension today and transform your browsing experience!


It's open source!
